item.description: JANUARY 27  (Sunday) SINGLES WALK and LUNCH at  West Hartford Reservoir in Farmington starting at 11 am.  What a great way to spend a wintery Sunday morning!  The walk takes about an hour and the water view is super.  Come join us!  After walk, we’ll go for lunch at a nearby restaurant.  No charge for walk.  For info, call Gail 860-582-8229.  Directions:  I‑84 Exit 39 (Rt. 4, Farmington), turn right at first light, go past UCONN  Medical Center, reservoir entrance on left, parking lot inside on left.  Go up to second parking area and we’ll meet there.  Sponsored by Social Connections.

group.name: The West Hartford Over 40 Fun Bunch!

item.name: Sunday morning walk
